entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 70S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
